data.prayer: Jesus, 2,605,000 people live in the state of Nakhon Ratchasima. Please, give them 521 new simple churches this year.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Nakhon Ratchasima, Thailand
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, instill a desire within the people of the state of Nakhon Ratchasima to hide your Word in their heart.
data.verse: I have hidden your Word in my heart that I might not sin against you.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 16,844 believers that their old life is dead and their new life is hid with Christ.
data.verse: For you died, and your life is hidden with Christ in God.

data.prayer: God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Nakhon Ratchasima, Thailand.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Lao Wieng people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Spirit, cause the 16,844 believers in Nakhon Ratchasima to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in Nakhon Ratchasima to agree with you and with one another.
Father, please send teachers of your Word in Nakhon Ratchasima who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.

location.name: Nakhon Ratchasima
location.cities_list: Nakhon Ratchasima, Pak Chong, Amphoe Sikhiu, Chok Chai, Khon Buri
location.cities_list_w_pop: Nakhon Ratchasima (208,781), Pak Chong (48,999), Amphoe Sikhiu (28,681), Chok Chai (23,337), Khon Buri (18,596)
